description:
This program makes command line interface much easier to use ExifTool (exiftool.org). I typically use as follows by first cd to directory in question, checking if any photos are already named, then running this command. -t uses filedatetime if no photo EXIF dates are available. -o uses original file names. -m moves from current folder.
phockup . ~/transfer -t
Make sure to set permissions for external devices like USB Hard Drives.
summary: Make Sure to Set Permissions for External Devices
